welcome_content:
The idea behind the app is to bring back
the sense of friendship and community.
We believe we can help everyone to
achieve more and create more
meaningful connections
let_s_start_opening_the_side_menu: Let's start opening the side menu
this_is_your_calendar_page: This is your Calendar page where you will see everything planned for and by you
create_and_share_with_family: Create and share with family and mates To-do tasks and lists
here_in_events: Here in Events you can find everything
every_time_you_receive_an_event_or_anyth: Every time you receive an event or anything it comes to Waiting for You tab for your approval or denial
every_time_you_create_an_event_and_it: Every time you create an event and it goes to Waiting for Someone tab for others to approve or deny
once_the_events_or_anything: Once the events or anything was confirmed it comes to the Confirmed tab
thanks_for_downloading_the_mou_app: Thanks for downloading the Mou app, this is just the beginning of something tremendous, stick with us because there are many more amazing features coming soon
the_last_thing_to_finish: The last thing to finish, let's add an event and invite some friends for a good dinner for example, they will receive a SMS to download the app and accept it, just click on the icon below to start
